title: Feats
notes: Feats cost one (1) Experience – or one (1) permanent corruption – to activate.

items.name: Clean Hit
items.text: The hero makes a normal attack and the successful hit or hits deal maximum damage.

items.name: Fearless
items.text: The hero ignores horror effects, like from the monstrous trait TERRIFY.

items.name: Ignore Corruption
items.text: During the rest of the turn, the accumulated corruption of the hero does not matter; all tests are made as if he or she had zero corruption. However, the hero suffers corruption as usual, which comes into play the following turn.

items.name: Perfect Defense
items.text: The hero parries or dodges a successful attack that otherwise would have hit him or her. Perfect Defense may only be used once per turn.

items.name: Quick Strike
items.text: The hero attacks first in the turn. If someone else is using Quick Strike, the order of initiative is settled in the normal way.

items.name: Resilience
items.text: +1d4 Armor for the rest of the turn.

items.name: Steely Gaze
items.text: The hero’s gaze makes an enemy step back and refrain from attacking the hero. If the fight is already on, the enemy may choose to attack another creature; if the fight has not started, the enemy will not attack before someone else deals the first blow.

items.name: Whirlwind Attack
items.text: In one combat action, the hero performs one attack against each enemy engaged in melee.
